items.content_html: This is Elmo - he manages the peer to peer feedback of your coworkers. He's keeping everything private and encrypted. He's lightweight and fast, also responsive and interactive.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
items.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
